prompt: <description>Part 1: Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to 0.0 for the x-axis, 0.0 for the y-axis, and -90.0 for the z-axis. The translation vector should be set to 0.0 for all axes. Create the first face of the sketch. It will be a rectangle with four vertices. * Line 1: Begin at the origin (0.0, 0.0) and end at (0.75, 0.0). * Line 2: Begin at (0.75, 0.0) and end at (0.75, 0.0391). * Line 3: Begin at (0.75, 0.0391) and end at (0.0, 0.1719). * Line 4: Begin at (0.0, 0.1719) and end at (0.0, 0.0). Create a closed loop to connect these four vertices. Scale the sketch uniformly by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model, with a depth of 0.1016 opposite the normal direction. Part 2: Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered end. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to 90.0 for the x-axis, 0.0 for the y-axis, and -90.0 for the z-axis. Set the translation vector to (0.0, 0.0766, 0.0625) for all axes. Create the first face of the sketch. It will be a circle with a center at (0.0234, 0.0234) and a radius of 0.0234. Create a closed loop to connect the vertices of the circle. Scale the sketch uniformly by a factor of 0.0469. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model, with a depth of 0.1319 opposite the normal direction, such that the resulting shape resembles a metallic tube or pipe. Final Shape: A three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. For the final shape, we will combine the two parts created above. The first part will serve as the base, and the second part will be cut into the base, creating a tapered cylindrical feature. The final shape will be a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a tapered cylindrical feature protruding from one side.</description>
